title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push, create models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); markdown, code highlighting, multi-user, model manager.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/push.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; chat, embed, create, copy, delete.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI REPL for chatting with Ollama models; history, markdown rendering, prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Minimal Bash wrapper around curl for quick Ollama REST calls; useful for CI and quick tests.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama; drop-in replacement for GPT calls.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, async enumerables, chat & embed APIs.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Swift, Rust, Go, Dart, PHP and more.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Llama3 for context-aware answers.

title: ollama-digitalocean
summary: 1-Click App image to spin up GPU droplets with Ollama pre-installed on DigitalOcean marketplace.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels; supports threads, app mentions, and modals.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template powered by Ollama; shows how to build UI in <50 lines.
